title: vEdhavaakyamani
sahitya:
vEdavAkyamani enciri I veladulella sammatinciri

caraNam 1

 ciralanniyu vadalinciri entO siggu cEta nandu nunciri
   
caraNam 2

 anduna niluvaga pOyenu mEnu landariki daDavanAyenu
   
caraNam 3

 kanukondunO ani saraguna pAliNTla karamula mUya marugunA
   
caraNam 4

 mAnamulanu musukondurO tama prANamulanu gAcu kondurO
   
caraNam 5

 celula nOreNDaga nAyenu nIru cilu cilumani ekkuvAyenu
   
caraNam 6

 valvalu gAnaka pOyenu satula vadanamu laTu srukkanAyenu
   
caraNam 7

 karagi karagi angalArciri celulu kamalAkSu nuramuna jErci
   
caraNam 8

 kanula kADuka nIru karaga jUci kAntuDentO muddu karaga
   
caraNam 9

 ramaNula madamella jarigenu tyAgarAja nutuni madi karagenu
